[User Question]
Find invoices with largest number of distribution lines per vendor */

SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME, i.INVOICE_NUM, COUNT(d.INVOICE_DISTRIBUTION_ID) AS LINE_COUNT FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all d JOIN ap_invoices_all i ON d.INVOICE_ID = i.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_suppliers s ON i.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME, i.INVOICE_NUM ORDER BY LINE_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
List POs where goods are still pending full delivery (received quantity less than ordered quantity).*/

SELECT      pha.segment1 AS po_number,     aps.vendor_name,     NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,     PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE,     SUM(         CASE              WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity             WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN -1 * rct.quantity             ELSE 0         END     ) AS net_received_qty,     SUM(plA.quantity) AS total_ordered_qty FROM      po_headers_all pha     JOIN po_lines_all pla          ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id         JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS HR         ON HR.ORGANIZATION_ID = PHA.ORG_ID         AND UPPER(HR.NAME) LIKE  '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'     JOIN po_line_locations_all plla          ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id     JOIN po_distributions_all pod          ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id     JOIN rcv_transactions rct          ON pod.po_distribution_id = rct.po_distribution_id     JOIN ap_suppliers aps          ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id     LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi          ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id          AND pod.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE      rct.transaction_date < TO_DATE('2007-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY      pha.segment1,     aps.vendor_name,     NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description),     pha.po_header_id,     pla.po_line_id,     PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE HAVING      SUM(         CASE              WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity             WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN -1 * rct.quantity             ELSE 0         END     ) < SUM(plA.quantity)

[User Question]
LSIT OF STANDARD INVOICES FOR PERIOD APRIL 06

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS, ai.AMOUNT_PAID, ai.CANCELLED_DATE, ai.GL_DATE, ai.CREATION_DATE, ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT * NVL(ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, 1) base_cur_amt, ai.DESCRIPTION, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, ai.SOURCE, t.NAME AS TERM_NAME, hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME, gl.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE) AS VALIDATION_STATUS FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL ai JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL ss ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID LEFT JOIN AP_TERMS t ON ai.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID LEFT JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN GL_LEDGERS gl ON ai.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = gl.LEDGER_ID WHERE ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD' AND ai.GL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-APR-2006','DD-MON-YYYY') AND TO_DATE('30-APR-2006','DD-MON-YYYY') AND hou.NAME = 'Vision Operations'

Find items and their PO numbers where shipment unit price is missing (null).*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number FROM rcv_shipment_lines rsl JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rsl.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsl.shipment_unit_price IS NULL

[User Question]
get the list of oustanding invoices as on 31 dec 2007 for vision operations*/

WITH cutoff_param AS (
    /* Define the cutoff date and operating unit name as parameters */
    SELECT 
        TO_DATE('2007-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cutoff_date,
        'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name
    FROM dual
),  payments_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Payments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */
    SELECT
        aip.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aip.AMOUNT, 0)) AS payment_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1
    WHERE
        aip.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aip.INVOICE_ID
),  prepay_after_cutoff AS (
    /* Prepayment adjustments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */
    SELECT
        aid.INVOICE_ID,
        SUM(NVL(aid.AMOUNT, 0)) AS prepay_after_cutoff
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all aid
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1
    WHERE
        aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY'
        AND aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aid.INVOICE_ID
),  invoice_balances AS (
    /* Total invoice balances (sum of gross_amount across all payment schedules per invoice),
       restricted to the specified operating unit */
    SELECT
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.INVOICE_NUM,
        ai.INVOICE_DATE,
        ai.VENDOR_ID,
        SUM(aps.GROSS_AMOUNT) AS GROSS_AMOUNT
    FROM
        ap_invoices_all ai
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
        JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1
    WHERE
        UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.INVOICE_NUM,
        ai.INVOICE_DATE,
        ai.VENDOR_ID
)  SELECT
    /* Final result: unpaid balances per invoice as of the cutoff date */
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    ib.INVOICE_ID,
    ib.INVOICE_NUM,
    ib.INVOICE_DATE,
    ib.GROSS_AMOUNT,
    NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) AS payment_after_cutoff,
    NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0) AS prepay_after_cutoff,
    (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) AS UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF
FROM
    invoice_balances ib
    JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ib.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
    LEFT JOIN payments_after_cutoff pac ON ib.INVOICE_ID = pac.INVOICE_ID
    LEFT JOIN prepay_after_cutoff ppc ON ib.INVOICE_ID = ppc.INVOICE_ID
WHERE
    /* Exclude invoices where unpaid balance is fully cleared */
    (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) <> 0
ORDER BY
    UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: VENDOR */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
    JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'VENDOR'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
    AND UPPER(hr.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

WITH summarized_po_distributions AS (
    SELECT 
        pd.po_line_id,
        SUM(NVL(pd.quantity_ordered, 0)) AS sum_qty_ordered,
        SUM(NVL(pd.quantity_delivered, 0)) AS sum_qty_delivered,
        SUM(NVL(pd.quantity_billed, 0)) AS sum_qty_billed,
        SUM(NVL(pd.amount_billed, 0)) AS sum_amt_billed
    FROM 
        po_distributions_all pd
    GROUP BY 
        pd.po_line_id
)

SELECT 
    ph.segment1 AS po_number,
    ph.creation_date AS po_date,
    aps.vendor_name,
    apsa.vendor_site_code,
    pl.line_num,
    pl.item_id,
    pl.unit_meas_lookup_code AS transaction_uom,
    pl.item_description AS purchase_line_description,
    msi.segment1 AS item_code,
    msi.description AS item_description,
    msi.primary_uom_code,
    hou.name AS operating_unit,
    ood.organization_code AS inventory_org_code,
    gl.name AS ledger_name,
    pl.quantity AS line_qty_ordered,
    pl.unit_price AS line_unit_price,
    NVL(pl.quantity, 0) * NVL(pl.unit_price, 0) * NVL(ph.rate, 1) AS line_amount_ordered,
    spd.sum_qty_delivered AS dist_qty_delivered,
    spd.sum_qty_billed AS dist_qty_billed,
    spd.sum_amt_billed AS dist_amount_billed
FROM 
    po_headers_all ph
    JOIN po_lines_all pl ON ph.po_header_id = pl.po_header_id
    JOIN summarized_po_distributions spd ON pl.po_line_id = spd.po_line_id
    LEFT JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ph.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
    LEFT JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all apsa ON ph.vendor_site_id = apsa.vendor_site_id
    LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi 
        ON pl.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id 
       AND pl.org_id = msi.organization_id
    LEFT JOIN hr_operating_units hou ON ph.org_id = hou.organization_id
    LEFT JOIN org_organization_definitions ood ON pl.org_id = ood.organization_id
    LEFT JOIN gl_ledgers gl ON hou.set_of_books_id = gl.ledger_id
WHERE 
   1=1
    AND pl.quantity < spd.sum_qty_delivered
    AND (NVL(pl.quantity, 0) * NVL(pl.unit_price, 0)) < spd.sum_amt_billed
ORDER BY 
    ph.segment1, pl.line_num

[User Question]
give me the list of invoices giving the aging bucket of their approvals delays

WITH approval_data
     AS (SELECT ai.invoice_id,
                ai.invoice_num,
                ai.invoice_date,
                aps.vendor_name,
                ah.iteration,
                ah.response,
                ah.creation_date AS response_date,
                RANK ()
                OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration
                      ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id)
                   AS rn_first,
                RANK ()
                OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration
                      ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id DESC)
                   AS rn_last
           FROM ap_invoices_all ai
                JOIN ap_suppliers aps
                   ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
                JOIN ap_inv_aprvl_hist_all ah
                   ON ai.invoice_id = ah.invoice_id
          WHERE 1 = 1),
     submission_dates
     AS (  SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MIN (response_date) AS submitted_date
             FROM approval_data
            WHERE response NOT IN
                     ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED')
         GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration),
     approval_dates
     AS (  SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MAX (response_date) AS approved_date
             FROM approval_data
            WHERE response IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED')
         GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration),
     latest_iterations
     AS (  SELECT invoice_id, MAX (iteration) AS latest_iteration
             FROM approval_data
         GROUP BY invoice_id),
     final_data
     AS (SELECT s.invoice_id,
                ai.invoice_num,
                ai.invoice_date,
                aps.vendor_name,
                s.iteration,
                s.submitted_date,
                a.approved_date,
                CASE
                   WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL
                   THEN
                      a.approved_date - s.submitted_date
                   ELSE
                      CURRENT_DATE - s.submitted_date
                END
                   AS days_taken,
                CASE
                   WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL THEN 'Approved'
                   ELSE 'Pending or Withdrawn'
                END
                   AS approval_status,
                l.latest_iteration
           FROM submission_dates s
                LEFT JOIN approval_dates a
                   ON     s.invoice_id = a.invoice_id
                      AND s.iteration = a.iteration
                JOIN latest_iterations l
                   ON s.invoice_id = l.invoice_id
                JOIN ap_invoices_all ai
                   ON s.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
                JOIN ap_suppliers aps
                   ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id)
  SELECT invoice_num,
         invoice_date,
         vendor_name,
         iteration,
         invoice_id,
         submitted_date,
         approved_date,
         days_taken,
         approval_status
    FROM final_data
   WHERE    (approved_date IS NOT NULL AND days_taken > 0)
         OR (    approved_date IS NULL
             AND iteration = latest_iteration
             AND days_taken > 0)
ORDER BY submitted_date DESC

Calculate vendor-level payment clearing rate in Vision Operations */

item lying in receiving location  by return to receivng without return to supplier for long time over 2 months

WITH return_to_receiving AS ( SELECT po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id, SUM(quantity) AS rtr_qty, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_rtr_date FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING' GROUP BY po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id ), return_to_vendor AS ( SELECT po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id, SUM(quantity) AS rtv_qty, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_rtv_date FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' GROUP BY po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id ), returns_combined AS ( SELECT rtr.po_distribution_id, rtr.shipment_line_id, rtr.rtr_qty, rtr.last_rtr_date, NVL(rtv.rtv_qty, 0) AS rtv_qty, rtv.last_rtv_date FROM return_to_receiving rtr LEFT JOIN return_to_vendor rtv ON rtr.po_distribution_id = rtv.po_distribution_id AND rtr.shipment_line_id = rtv.shipment_line_id WHERE NVL(rtr.rtr_qty, 0) - NVL(rtv.rtv_qty, 0) > 0 ) SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, pha.creation_date AS po_date, pla.line_num AS po_line_number, pla.item_id, msi.segment1 AS item_code, msi.description AS item_description, pda.distribution_num, rc.rtr_qty AS qty_returned_to_receiving, rc.rtv_qty AS qty_returned_to_vendor, rc.last_rtr_date, rc.last_rtv_date, (NVL(rc.last_rtv_date, SYSDATE) - rc.last_rtr_date) AS days_since_return_to_receiving FROM po_distributions_all pda JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pda.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND msi.organization_id = pda.destination_organization_id JOIN returns_combined rc ON rc.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id ORDER BY pha.segment1, pla.line_num

[User Question]
Give me closing balances for Jan and June 2003 along with the growth percentage for vision operations ledger showing the list of accounts that have grown by more than 5% between the above months. Include only expense accounts

WITH closing_balances AS (
    SELECT
        to_char(gp.start_date, 'YYYY-MM')                                                                                        AS period
        ,
        gcc.segment3                                                                                                             AS account
        ,
        SUM(nvl(bal.begin_balance_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.begin_balance_cr, 0) + nvl(bal.period_net_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.period_net_cr, 0)) AS closing_balance
    FROM
             gl_balances bal
        JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id
        JOIN gl_ledgers           led ON bal.ledger_id = led.ledger_id
        JOIN gl_periods           gp ON bal.period_name = gp.period_name
                              AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                              AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type
    WHERE
            led.name = 'Vision Operations (USA)'
        AND gcc.account_type = 'E'
        AND gp.start_date IN ( TO_DATE('2003-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE('2003-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
        AND bal.actual_flag = 'A'
        AND bal.template_id IS NULL
        AND bal.translated_flag IS NULL
        AND bal.currency_code = led.currency_code
    GROUP BY
        to_char(gp.start_date, 'YYYY-MM'),
        gcc.segment3
)
SELECT
    period,
    account,
    MAX(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) AS "Jan-03 Closing",
    MAX(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-06' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) AS "Jun-03 Closing",
    nullif((max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-06' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) - max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    )),
           0) * 100.0 / nullif(
        max(
            CASE
                WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                    closing_balance
            END
        ),
        0
    ) AS growth_percentage
FROM
    closing_balances
GROUP BY
    period,
    account
HAVING

    nullif((max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-06' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) - max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    )),
           0) * 100.0 / nullif(
        max(
            CASE
                WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                    closing_balance
            END
        ),
        0
    )  > 5
ORDER BY
    account;

[User Question]
get list of items sent back to receiving for return to supplier but still not returned to supplier

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,
         pha.creation_date AS po_date,
         pla.line_num AS po_line_number,
         pla.item_id,
         msi.segment1 AS item_code,
         msi.description AS item_description,
         pda.distribution_num,
         COALESCE (rt_stagging.qty_rtn_to_staging, 0) AS qty_rtn_to_staging,
         COALESCE (rt_vendor.qty_rtn_to_vendor, 0) AS qty_rtn_to_vendor,
         (  COALESCE (rt_stagging.qty_rtn_to_staging, 0)
          - COALESCE (rt_vendor.qty_rtn_to_vendor, 0))
            AS qty_pending_rtn_to_vendor
    FROM po_headers_all pha
         JOIN po_lines_all pla
            ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id
         JOIN po_distributions_all pda
            ON pla.po_line_id = pda.po_line_id
         JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi
            ON     pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
               AND msi.organization_id = pda.destination_organization_id
         LEFT JOIN (  SELECT rt.po_distribution_id,
                             SUM (
                                rt.quantity * COALESCE (muc.conversion_rate, 1))
                                AS qty_rtn_to_staging
                        FROM rcv_transactions rt
                             JOIN po_distributions_all pda
                                ON rt.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id
                             JOIN po_lines_all pla
                                ON pda.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id
                            left JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi
                                ON     pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
                                   AND pda.destination_organization_id =
                                          msi.organization_id
                             LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc
                                ON     muc.inventory_item_id =
                                          msi.inventory_item_id
                                   AND muc.uom_code = rt.uom_code
                        WHERE rt.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING'
                    GROUP BY rt.po_distribution_id) rt_stagging
            ON rt_stagging.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id
         LEFT JOIN (  SELECT rt.po_distribution_id,
                             SUM (
                                rt.quantity * COALESCE (muc.conversion_rate, 1))
                                AS qty_rtn_to_vendor
                        FROM rcv_transactions rt
                             JOIN po_distributions_all pda
                                ON rt.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id
                             JOIN po_lines_all pla
                                ON pda.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id
                             left JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi
                                ON     pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
                                   AND pda.destination_organization_id =
                                          msi.organization_id
                             LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc
                                ON     muc.inventory_item_id =
                                          msi.inventory_item_id
                                   AND muc.uom_code = rt.uom_code                                   
                       WHERE rt.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR'
                    GROUP BY rt.po_distribution_id) rt_vendor
            ON rt_vendor.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id
   WHERE (  COALESCE (rt_stagging.qty_rtn_to_staging, 0)
         - COALESCE (rt_vendor.qty_rtn_to_vendor, 0)) > 0
ORDER BY pha.segment1, pla.line_num

[User Question]
give me invoice wise aging as on 31-dec-2007 in the buckets of 1-30,31-60,61-90 and 90 and above for vision operations */

WITH param AS (
    /* Define cutoff date and operating unit name centrally */
    SELECT 
        TO_DATE('31-dec-2007', 'dd-mon-yyyy') AS cutoff_date,
        'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name
    FROM dual
),  direct_payments AS (
    /* Payments made up to cutoff date for the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aip.invoice_id,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.gross_amount,
        SUM(NVL(aip.amount, 0)) AS paid_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps 
            ON aip.invoice_id = aps.invoice_id
            AND aip.payment_num = aps.payment_num
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.org_id = hr.organization_id
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aip.accounting_date <= p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.name) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aip.invoice_id, aps.due_date, aps.payment_num, aps.gross_amount
),  prepayment_applied AS (
    /* Prepayments applied up to cutoff date for the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aid.invoice_id,
        SUM(NVL(aid.amount, 0)) AS prepay_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all aid
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.org_id = hr.organization_id
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aid.line_type_lookup_code = 'PREPAY'
        AND aid.accounting_date <= p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.name) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aid.invoice_id
),  payment_schedule_ordered AS (
    /* Ordered payment schedules per invoice, restricted to Vision Operations */
    SELECT
        aps.invoice_id,
        ai.invoice_num,
        ai.invoice_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.gross_amount,
        NVL(dp.paid_amount, 0) AS paid_amount,
        NVL(pap.prepay_amount, 0) AS prepay_amount,
        s.vendor_name,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aps.invoice_id ORDER BY aps.due_date) AS rn
    FROM
        ap_payment_schedules_all aps
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aps.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ai.vendor_id = s.vendor_id
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.org_id = hr.organization_id
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
        LEFT JOIN direct_payments dp ON aps.invoice_id = dp.invoice_id AND aps.payment_num = dp.payment_num
        LEFT JOIN prepayment_applied pap ON aps.invoice_id = pap.invoice_id
    WHERE
        UPPER(hr.name) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
),  allocated_schedules (
    invoice_id,
    invoice_num,
    invoice_date,
    vendor_name,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age,
    rn
) AS (
    /* Anchor row */
    SELECT
        invoice_id,
        invoice_num,
        invoice_date,
        vendor_name,
        payment_num,
        due_date,
        gross_amount,
        paid_amount,
        prepay_amount,
        0 AS prepay_applied,
        gross_amount - paid_amount AS remaining_amount,
        (SELECT cutoff_date FROM param) - due_date AS age,
        rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered
    WHERE rn = 1      UNION ALL      /* Recursive application of prepayments */
    SELECT
        ps.invoice_id,
        ps.invoice_num,
        ps.invoice_date,
        ps.vendor_name,
        ps.payment_num,
        ps.due_date,
        ps.gross_amount,
        ps.paid_amount,
        ps.prepay_amount,
        CASE
            WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
            ELSE 0
        END AS prepay_applied,
        ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount -
            CASE
                WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                    LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
                ELSE 0
            END AS remaining_amount,
        (SELECT cutoff_date FROM param) - ps.due_date AS age,
        ps.rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered ps
    JOIN allocated_schedules prev 
        ON ps.invoice_id = prev.invoice_id AND ps.rn = prev.rn + 1
)  SELECT
    /* One row per invoice payment schedule with aging in columns */
    vendor_name,
    invoice_num,
    invoice_id,
    invoice_date,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age,
    CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_0_30,
    CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_31_60,
    CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_61_90,
    CASE WHEN age > 90 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_90_plus
FROM allocated_schedules
WHERE remaining_amount <> 0
ORDER BY vendor_name, invoice_num, due_date

[User Question]
List POs where goods are still pending full delivery (received quantity less than ordered quantity).*/

SELECT      pha.segment1 AS po_number,     aps.vendor_name,     NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,     PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE,     SUM(         CASE              WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity             WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN -1 * rct.quantity             ELSE 0         END     ) AS net_received_qty,     SUM(plA.quantity) AS total_ordered_qty FROM      po_headers_all pha     JOIN po_lines_all pla          ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id         JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS HR         ON HR.ORGANIZATION_ID = PHA.ORG_ID         AND UPPER(HR.NAME) LIKE  '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'     JOIN po_line_locations_all plla          ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id     JOIN po_distributions_all pod          ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id     JOIN rcv_transactions rct          ON pod.po_distribution_id = rct.po_distribution_id     JOIN ap_suppliers aps          ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id     LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi          ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id          AND pod.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE      rct.transaction_date < TO_DATE('2007-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY      pha.segment1,     aps.vendor_name,     NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description),     pha.po_header_id,     pla.po_line_id,     PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE HAVING      SUM(         CASE              WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity             WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN -1 * rct.quantity             ELSE 0         END     ) < SUM(plA.quantity)

[User Question]
give me supplier invoice aging in buckets of 60,60,90 and above

SELECT aps.vendor_name,
         COUNT (ai.invoice_id) AS total_invoices,
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) BETWEEN 0 AND 30
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "0-30 Days",
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) BETWEEN 31 AND 60
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "31-60 Days",
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) BETWEEN 61 AND 90
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "61-90 Days",
         SUM (
            CASE
               WHEN (CURRENT_DATE - ass.due_date) > 90
               THEN
                  ass.amount_remaining
               ELSE
                  0
            END)
            AS "91+ Days",
         SUM (ass.amount_remaining) AS total_outstanding
    FROM ap_invoices_all ai
         JOIN ap_suppliers aps
            ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
         JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all ass
            ON ai.invoice_id = ass.invoice_id
         LEFT JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip
            ON     ass.invoice_id = aip.invoice_id
               AND ass.payment_num = aip.payment_num
   WHERE     ai.cancelled_date IS NULL
         AND ass.amount_remaining > 0
         AND (aip.creation_date IS NULL OR aip.creation_date > CURRENT_DATE)
GROUP BY aps.vendor_name
ORDER BY total_outstanding DESC

[User Question]
give me invoice wise aging as on 31-dec-2007 in the buckets of 1-30,31-60,61-90 and 90 and above for vision operations */

WITH param AS (
    /* Define cutoff date and operating unit name centrally */
    SELECT 
        TO_DATE('31-dec-2007', 'dd-mon-yyyy') AS cutoff_date,
        'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name
    FROM dual
),  direct_payments AS (
    /* Payments made up to cutoff date for the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aip.invoice_id,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.gross_amount,
        SUM(NVL(aip.amount, 0)) AS paid_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_payments_all aip
        JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps 
            ON aip.invoice_id = aps.invoice_id
            AND aip.payment_num = aps.payment_num
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.org_id = hr.organization_id
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aip.accounting_date <= p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.name) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aip.invoice_id, aps.due_date, aps.payment_num, aps.gross_amount
),  prepayment_applied AS (
    /* Prepayments applied up to cutoff date for the given operating unit */
    SELECT
        aid.invoice_id,
        SUM(NVL(aid.amount, 0)) AS prepay_amount
    FROM
        ap_invoice_distributions_all aid
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.org_id = hr.organization_id
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
    WHERE
        aid.line_type_lookup_code = 'PREPAY'
        AND aid.accounting_date <= p.cutoff_date
        AND UPPER(hr.name) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
    GROUP BY
        aid.invoice_id
),  payment_schedule_ordered AS (
    /* Ordered payment schedules per invoice, restricted to Vision Operations */
    SELECT
        aps.invoice_id,
        ai.invoice_num,
        ai.invoice_date,
        aps.payment_num,
        aps.due_date,
        aps.gross_amount,
        NVL(dp.paid_amount, 0) AS paid_amount,
        NVL(pap.prepay_amount, 0) AS prepay_amount,
        s.vendor_name,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aps.invoice_id ORDER BY aps.due_date) AS rn
    FROM
        ap_payment_schedules_all aps
        JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aps.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
        JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ai.vendor_id = s.vendor_id
        JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.org_id = hr.organization_id
        JOIN param p ON 1=1
        LEFT JOIN direct_payments dp ON aps.invoice_id = dp.invoice_id AND aps.payment_num = dp.payment_num
        LEFT JOIN prepayment_applied pap ON aps.invoice_id = pap.invoice_id
    WHERE
        UPPER(hr.name) = UPPER(p.operating_unit_name)
),  allocated_schedules (
    invoice_id,
    invoice_num,
    invoice_date,
    vendor_name,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age,
    rn
) AS (
    /* Anchor row */
    SELECT
        invoice_id,
        invoice_num,
        invoice_date,
        vendor_name,
        payment_num,
        due_date,
        gross_amount,
        paid_amount,
        prepay_amount,
        0 AS prepay_applied,
        gross_amount - paid_amount AS remaining_amount,
        (SELECT cutoff_date FROM param) - due_date AS age,
        rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered
    WHERE rn = 1      UNION ALL      /* Recursive application of prepayments */
    SELECT
        ps.invoice_id,
        ps.invoice_num,
        ps.invoice_date,
        ps.vendor_name,
        ps.payment_num,
        ps.due_date,
        ps.gross_amount,
        ps.paid_amount,
        ps.prepay_amount,
        CASE
            WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
            ELSE 0
        END AS prepay_applied,
        ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount -
            CASE
                WHEN prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied > 0 THEN
                    LEAST(ps.gross_amount - ps.paid_amount, prev.prepay_amount - prev.prepay_applied)
                ELSE 0
            END AS remaining_amount,
        (SELECT cutoff_date FROM param) - ps.due_date AS age,
        ps.rn
    FROM payment_schedule_ordered ps
    JOIN allocated_schedules prev 
        ON ps.invoice_id = prev.invoice_id AND ps.rn = prev.rn + 1
)  SELECT
    /* One row per invoice payment schedule with aging in columns */
    vendor_name,
    invoice_num,
    invoice_id,
    invoice_date,
    payment_num,
    due_date,
    gross_amount,
    paid_amount,
    prepay_applied,
    remaining_amount,
    age,
    CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_0_30,
    CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_31_60,
    CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_61_90,
    CASE WHEN age > 90 THEN remaining_amount ELSE 0 END AS bucket_90_plus
FROM allocated_schedules
WHERE remaining_amount <> 0
ORDER BY vendor_name, invoice_num, due_date

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: TAX AUTHORITY */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'TAX AUTHORITY'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

[User Question]
get item wise purchases from purchase order not necessarily received Calculate total purchase for item AS54888

SELECT 
    CASE WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL THEN m.segment1 ELSE NULL END AS item_segment1,
    CASE
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL AND m.description IS NOT NULL THEN m.description
        ELSE pl.item_description
    END AS item_description,
    SUM (
        pl.unit_price
        * COALESCE(h.rate, 1)
        * COALESCE(pd.quantity_ordered, 0)
    ) AS total_purchase
FROM po_distributions_all pd
JOIN po_lines_all pl ON pl.po_line_id = pd.po_line_id
JOIN po_headers_all h ON pl.po_header_id = h.po_header_id AND h.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD'
LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b m ON pd.destination_organization_id = m.organization_id
                                AND pl.item_id = m.inventory_item_id
WHERE 
    pl.item_description LIKE '%AS54888%'
    OR m.description LIKE '%AS54888%'
    OR m.segment1 LIKE '%AS54888%'
GROUP BY 
    CASE WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL THEN m.segment1 ELSE NULL END,
    CASE
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL AND m.description IS NOT NULL THEN m.description
        ELSE pl.item_description
    END
ORDER BY total_purchase DESC

[User Question]
Give me closing balances for Jan and June 2003 along with the growth percentage for vision operations ledger showing the list of accounts that have grown by more than 5% between the above months. Include only expense accounts

WITH closing_balances AS (
    SELECT
        to_char(gp.start_date, 'YYYY-MM')                                                                                        AS period
        ,
        gcc.segment3                                                                                                             AS account
        ,
        SUM(nvl(bal.begin_balance_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.begin_balance_cr, 0) + nvl(bal.period_net_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.period_net_cr, 0)) AS closing_balance
    FROM
             gl_balances bal
        JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id
        JOIN gl_ledgers           led ON bal.ledger_id = led.ledger_id
        JOIN gl_periods           gp ON bal.period_name = gp.period_name
                              AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                              AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type
    WHERE
            led.name = 'Vision Operations (USA)'
        AND gcc.account_type = 'E'
        AND gp.start_date IN ( TO_DATE('2003-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE('2003-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
        AND bal.actual_flag = 'A'
        AND bal.template_id IS NULL
        AND bal.translated_flag IS NULL
        AND bal.currency_code = led.currency_code
    GROUP BY
        to_char(gp.start_date, 'YYYY-MM'),
        gcc.segment3
)
SELECT
    period,
    account,
    MAX(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) AS "Jan-03 Closing",
    MAX(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-06' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) AS "Jun-03 Closing",
    nullif((max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-06' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) - max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    )),
           0) * 100.0 / nullif(
        max(
            CASE
                WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                    closing_balance
            END
        ),
        0
    ) AS growth_percentage
FROM
    closing_balances
GROUP BY
    period,
    account
HAVING

    nullif((max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-06' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    ) - max(
        CASE
            WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                closing_balance
        END
    )),
           0) * 100.0 / nullif(
        max(
            CASE
                WHEN period = '2003-01' THEN
                    closing_balance
            END
        ),
        0
    )  > 5
ORDER BY
    account;

to get the converted translated trial balance into a different currency for example usd trial balance into ggp following the is query

WITH trial_balance AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(GP.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS period, GCC.SEGMENT3 AS account, GL_FLEXFIELDS_PKG.GET_DESCRIPTION_SQL(LED.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID, 3, GCC.SEGMENT3) AS account_desc, SUM(NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0) + NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS closing_balance, GP.END_DATE AS period_end_date, LED.CURRENCY_CODE AS ledger_currency FROM GL_BALANCES BAL JOIN GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS GCC ON BAL.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = GCC.CODE_COMBINATION_ID JOIN GL_LEDGERS LED ON BAL.LEDGER_ID = LED.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS GP ON BAL.PERIOD_NAME = GP.PERIOD_NAME AND GP.PERIOD_SET_NAME = LED.PERIOD_SET_NAME AND GP.PERIOD_TYPE = LED.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE WHERE LED.NAME = 'Vision Operations (USA)' AND GP.START_DATE >= (SELECT START_DATE FROM GL_PERIODS WHERE PERIOD_NAME = 'Jan-08' AND PERIOD_SET_NAME = LED.PERIOD_SET_NAME AND PERIOD_TYPE = LED.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE) AND GP.END_DATE <= (SELECT END_DATE FROM GL_PERIODS WHERE PERIOD_NAME = 'Mar-08' AND PERIOD_SET_NAME = LED.PERIOD_SET_NAME AND PERIOD_TYPE = LED.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE) AND BAL.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND BAL.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND BAL.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND BAL.CURRENCY_CODE = LED.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(GP.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'), GCC.SEGMENT3, GL_FLEXFIELDS_PKG.GET_DESCRIPTION_SQL(LED.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID, 3, GCC.SEGMENT3), GP.END_DATE, LED.CURRENCY_CODE ) SELECT TB.account, TB.account_desc, /* USD Closing Balances */ MAX(CASE WHEN TB.period = '2008-01' THEN TB.closing_balance END) AS "Jan-08 Closing (USD)", MAX(CASE WHEN TB.period = '2008-02' THEN TB.closing_balance END) AS "Feb-08 Closing (USD)", MAX(CASE WHEN TB.period = '2008-03' THEN TB.closing_balance END) AS "Mar-08 Closing (USD)",  /* Converted GBP Balances */ MAX(CASE WHEN TB.period = '2008-01' THEN TB.closing_balance * GR.CONVERSION_RATE END) AS "Jan-08 Closing (GBP)", MAX(CASE WHEN TB.period = '2008-02' THEN TB.closing_balance * GR.CONVERSION_RATE END) AS "Feb-08 Closing (GBP)", MAX(CASE WHEN TB.period = '2008-03' THEN TB.closing_balance * GR.CONVERSION_RATE END) AS "Mar-08 Closing (GBP)" FROM trial_balance TB LEFT JOIN GL_DAILY_RATES GR ON GR.CONVERSION_DATE = TB.period_end_date AND GR.CONVERSION_TYPE = 'Corporate' AND GR.FROM_CURRENCY = TB.ledger_currency AND GR.TO_CURRENCY = 'GBP' GROUP BY TB.account, TB.account_desc ORDER BY TB.account

aps.DUE_DATE AS DELAY_DAYS, sup.VENDOR_NAME, hou.NAME AS ORG_NAME FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON aps.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID AND aps.PAYMENT_NUM = aip.PAYMENT_NUM JOIN ap_suppliers sup ON ai.VENDOR_ID = sup.VENDOR_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.organization_id JOIN param ON hou.name = param.org_name WHERE ai.INVOICE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-JAN-2008','DD-MON-YYYY') AND TO_DATE('31-DEC-2008','DD-MON-YYYY')), prepay_lines AS (SELECT ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_DATE, aps.PAYMENT_NUM, aps.DUE_DATE, aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE, aid.AMOUNT AS PREPAY_AMOUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aid.INVOICE_ID ORDER BY aps.DUE_DATE) AS rn, sup.VENDOR_NAME, hou.NAME AS ORG_NAME FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_invoice_distributions_all aid ON aid.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_suppliers sup ON ai.VENDOR_ID = sup.VENDOR_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.organization_id JOIN param ON hou.name = param.org_name WHERE ai.INVOICE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-JAN-2008','DD-MON-YYYY') AND TO_DATE('31-DEC-2008','DD-MON-YYYY') AND aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY'), prepay_applied AS (SELECT INVOICE_ID, INVOICE_NUM, INVOICE_DATE, PAYMENT_NUM, DUE_DATE, PREPAY_AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, 'PREPAYMENT' AS SOURCE_TYPE, ACCOUNTING_DATE AS SOURCE_DATE, ACCOUNTING_DATE - [User Question]
give me list of suppllier invoices that are NOT paid before the due date by more than 60 days

SELECT 
    ai.invoice_id,
    ai.invoice_num,
    ai.invoice_date,
    ass.due_date,
    ass.amount_remaining,
    ai.vendor_id,
    aps.vendor_name,
    ai.creation_date AS invoice_creation_date,
    ai.last_update_date AS invoice_last_update_date,
    ass.payment_num,
    NVL(aip.creation_date, SYSDATE) AS payment_date,
    ROUND(NVL(aip.creation_date, SYSDATE) - ass.due_date) AS delayed_days
FROM 
    ap_invoices_all ai
JOIN 
    ap_suppliers aps ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
JOIN 
    ap_payment_schedules_all ass ON ai.invoice_id = ass.invoice_id
LEFT JOIN 
    ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ass.invoice_id = aip.invoice_id 
                                 AND ass.payment_num = aip.payment_num
LEFT JOIN 
    ap_checks_all aca ON aip.check_id = aca.check_id
WHERE 
    ai.cancelled_date IS NULL
    AND ai.invoice_amount > 0
    AND ROUND(NVL(aip.creation_date, SYSDATE) - ass.due_date) > 60
ORDER BY 
    ass.payment_num, 
    ai.invoice_id, 
    aip.payment_num

[User Question]
get the list of oustanding invoices as on 31 dec 2007 for vision operations backdate

WITH cutoff_param AS ( /* Define the cutoff date and operating unit name as parameters */ SELECT TO_DATE('2007-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cutoff_date, 'Vision Operations' AS operating_unit_name FROM dual ),  payments_after_cutoff AS ( /* Payments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */ SELECT aip.INVOICE_ID, SUM(NVL(aip.AMOUNT, 0)) AS payment_after_cutoff FROM ap_invoice_payments_all aip JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aip.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1 WHERE aip.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name) GROUP BY aip.INVOICE_ID ),  prepay_after_cutoff AS ( /* Prepayment adjustments made after the cutoff date and restricted to the specified operating unit */ SELECT aid.INVOICE_ID, SUM(NVL(aid.AMOUNT, 0)) AS prepay_after_cutoff FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all aid JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.INVOICE_ID = ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1 WHERE aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY' AND aid.ACCOUNTING_DATE > c.cutoff_date AND UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name) GROUP BY aid.INVOICE_ID ),  invoice_balances AS ( /*Total invoice balances (sum of gross_amount across all payment schedules per invoice) restricted to the specified operating unit */ SELECT ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_DATE, ai.VENDOR_ID, SUM(aps.GROSS_AMOUNT) AS GROSS_AMOUNT FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units hr ON ai.ORG_ID = hr.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN cutoff_param c ON 1 = 1 WHERE UPPER(hr.NAME) = UPPER(c.operating_unit_name) GROUP BY ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_DATE, ai.VENDOR_ID )  SELECT /*Final result: unpaid balances per invoice as of the cutoff date */ s.VENDOR_NAME, ib.INVOICE_ID, ib.INVOICE_NUM, ib.INVOICE_DATE, ib.GROSS_AMOUNT, NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) AS payment_after_cutoff, NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0) AS prepay_after_cutoff, (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) AS UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF FROM invoice_balances ib JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ib.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN payments_after_cutoff pac ON ib.INVOICE_ID = pac.INVOICE_ID LEFT JOIN prepay_after_cutoff ppc ON ib.INVOICE_ID = ppc.INVOICE_ID WHERE /*Exclude invoices where unpaid balance is fully cleared */ (ib.GROSS_AMOUNT - NVL(pac.payment_after_cutoff, 0) - NVL(ppc.prepay_after_cutoff, 0)) <> 0 ORDER BY UNPAID_BALANCE_AS_OF_CUTOFF

[User Question]
Find top 5 invoices with largest payment delays under Vision Operations */

SELECT 
    ai.INVOICE_NUM, 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, 
    aps.DUE_DATE, 
    MAX(aip.CREATION_DATE) AS LAST_PAYMENT_DATE, 
    MAX(aip.CREATION_DATE - aps.DUE_DATE) AS MAX_DAYS_LATE
FROM 
    ap_invoices_all ai
JOIN 
    ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
JOIN 
    ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON aps.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID
JOIN 
    ap_suppliers s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
JOIN 
    hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE 
    aip.CREATION_DATE > aps.DUE_DATE
    AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
        ai.INVOICE_ID,
        ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
        ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
        ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
    ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WF_APPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED','MANUALLY APPROVED','NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    ai.INVOICE_NUM, 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, 
    aps.DUE_DATE
ORDER BY 
    MAX_DAYS_LATE DESC
FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
Current aging summary for vendor type: GOVERNMENT */

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME AS "VENDOR_NAME",
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE AS "VENDOR_TYPE",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE > SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "CURRENT",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 30 AND SYSDATE THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_1_30",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 60 AND SYSDATE - 31 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_31_60",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 90 AND SYSDATE - 61 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_61_90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE - 90 THEN aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING ELSE 0 END) AS "OVERDUE_90_PLUS"
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s
    JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID
    JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID
WHERE 
    s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'GOVERNMENT'
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, s.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE

    ap_suppliers s 
JOIN 
    ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID 
JOIN 
    ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID 
JOIN 
    hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID 
WHERE 
    aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE 
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0 
    AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'      -- Only approved invoices
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED','MANUALLY APPROVED','NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL  GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME 
ORDER BY 
    TOTAL_OVERDUE DESC 
FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

TO GET THE LIST OF ACCOUNTS OF A GIVEN TYPE SAY EXPENSE FOR MARCH 08FOLLOWING THE IS QUERY

SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, gcc.segment3) AS account_desc, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS credit, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0) + NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS closing_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type WHERE led.NAME = 'Vision Operations (USA)' AND gp.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND gp.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type) AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE and gcc.account_type = 'E' GROUP BY gcc.segment3, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, gcc.segment3) ORDER BY account

[User Question]
Retrieve item codes, PO numbers, and supplier names where quantity shipped is less than quantity received.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name FROM rcv_shipment_lines rsl JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rsl.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsl.quantity_shipped < rsl.quantity_received
